Description.Text: For whatever reason guests have chosen to visit the North East, it will find that the Highfield Hotel is ideally situated for all amenities. As a base for holiday that will be within an easy drive to the North Pennines, Hadrian's wall, Northumberland and the borders. To the east lie many coastal resorts and sailing facilities. The ancient city of Durham with its Cathedral, Castle and market are just minutes to the south. For shopping guest will be spoiled for choice. The world famous Metro Centre and Eldon Square are within 20 minutes drive and will find the city of Durham and Sunderland a shoppers paradise. Car Parking Available on site. Amenities includes bar, Disabled facilities, lift /elevator, parking facilities-at cost, reception, restaurant.

Business Twin - Rooms feature two single beds. All rooms include en-suite bathrooms with bath/showers, tea and coffee making facilities, large desk and 32" flat screen Freeview TV. Front rooms have views of penshaw monument.
Business Double - Our Double rooms feature a King Sized double bed. All rooms feature en-suite bathrooms with bath/showers, tea and coffee making facilities, large desk area and a 32" flat screen Freeview TV. Baloneys are available upon request.
Business Single - Our tastefully decorated bedrooms are fully equipped for all your needs. All rooms feature en-suite bathrooms with bath/showers, tea and coffee making facilities, large desk area and a 32" flat screen Freeview TV. Baloneys are available upon request.
